name: MLG_FactOreo
title: MLG Factorio
author: Kiplacon
description:
Adds a new 'special' type of bullet magazine, and a sniper rifle (scope included but not encouraged [you scrub]). Rack up a high kill streak and experience 2014 euphoria in what might actually be the worst Factorio mod to ever see the light of day.

Song clips used:
* Bangarang - Skrillex
* Come and Get It - Krewella
* I Keep Holding On (My Hope Will Never Die) - I See Monstas
* Dead Link - Barely Alive
* Get Blazed - Desembra
